contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 2, 1879 D West Stanley Contest
West Stanley Contest (Open Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Stanley Contest west-stanley-contest-open-section
West Stanley, County Durham No band was to consist of more than 18 performers, and had to play a selection and a set of waltzes each.
Prizes: £7 10s, £3, £2, £1
Dec. 12, 2011, 2:07 p.m. June 8, 2017, 7:37 a.m.
1 Woodlands Colliery [Durham] Thomas Wood Recollections of Meyerbeer [unknown arranger]
2 Lumley 6th Colliery H. Price Preciosa [unknown arranger]
3 Dipton John Ponton Il Trovatore [unknown arranger]
4 Pelton Fell Workmen's Joseph Brown Fete Musicale
5 Brandon Colliery W. T. Taylor Honoria
